entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Marathon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets changing to snow mixed with rain this evening and ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
